      • setMicrofitStatus

        public static boolean setMicrofitStatus(int no,
                        int value)
        set up microfit gpio status
        Parameters:
        no - gpio io no, should be 3
        value - should be 0-1, 0 means set output 0(low), 1 means set outpu 1(high)
        Returns:
        success：true, fail: false

      • getMicrofitStatus

        public static int getMicrofitStatus(int no)
        get microfit gpio status
        Parameters:
        no - gpio io no, should be 0-2
        Returns:
        0 mean status 0(low), 1 means status 1(high), other means fail.
